00031 #include "egs_base_source.h"
00032 #include "egs_rndm.h"
00033 #include "egs_input.h"
00034 #include "egs_timer.h"
00035 
00036 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00037 
00038     if( argc < 2 ) egsFatal("Usage: %s input_file\n",argv[0]);
00039 
00040     EGS_Input input; input.setContentFromFile(argv[1]);
00041     EGS_BaseSpectrum *spec = EGS_BaseSpectrum::createSpectrum(&input);
00042     if( !spec ) egsFatal("Got null source\n");
00043     egsInformation("Got spectrum of type %s\n",spec->getType().c_str());
00044 
00045     EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG();
00046 
00047     int ncase; int err = input.getInput("ncase",ncase);
00048     if( err ) ncase = 1000000;
00049 
00050     EGS_Timer t;
00051     for(int j=0; j<ncase; j++) spec->sampleEnergy(rndm);
00052     EGS_Float cpu = t.time();
00053     egsInformation("CPU time: %g\n",cpu);
00054     spec->reportAverageEnergy();
00055 
00056     delete spec; delete rndm;
00057     return 0;
00058 
00059 }
